article:
One Monday morning,I was standing waiting for the train and suddenly felt ill.I couldn't stand still,and the world began to sway and then went black.All I heard was"Oh,my God,she's falling." The next thing I    _  was that the doctor was asking me
my name.This happened    _  I Was too tired.I was so busy cleaning my new house that I didn't eat    _  last weekend.
The doctor told me that a gentleman waiting for the    _  saw me fall down.He got to my  side    at once  ,and told others to call 911.He stayed with me    until  the ambulance  arrived.Then he went with me to the hospital,which made him    _  his
train.The doctor told me the gentleman didn't want to leave his name.
I don't know who this gentleman is.    _  if
he reads this article and remembers a young lady fainting at the train station,I'd like    _  to know
that l want to say"Thank you"to him. Whenever I meet with such a thing,I will do the same as he    did  to me.And I'11 pass on the kindness to others.
